item.title: After nine years of grinding, Replit finally found its market. Can it keep it?

item.description: Get 10% off with a Dell promo code for new customers, plus today’s coupons for up to $600 off laptops, monitors, and all things tech.

item.title: At a Conspiracy Conference in Rural Ireland, Charlie Kirk Was the Star
item.description: The increasingly tight links between far-right groups in the US and Europe were on full display at the Rebels Across the Pond conference in Ireland.

item.title: Amazon to resume drone delivery following crash in Arizona
